001package gust.backend;
002
003
004import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
005
006
007/**
008 * Supplies shared logic to all framework-provided controller base classes. Responsible for managing such things as the
009 * {@link PageContextManager}, and any other request-scoped state.
010 *
011 * <p>Implementors of this class are provided with convenient access to initialized app logic and clients (such as gRPC
012 * clients or database clients). However, controller authors need not select this route for convenience sake if they
013 * have a better base class in mind: all the functionality provided here can easily be obtained via dependency
014 * injection.</p>
015 */
016@SuppressWarnings("WeakerAccess")
017public abstract class BaseController {
018  /** Holds request-bound page context as it is built. */
019  protected final @Nonnull PageContextManager context;
020
021  /**
022   * Protected (implementor) constructor. Demands each dependency directly (generally, implementors would make use of DI
023   * and pass the provided objects in).
024   *
025   * @param contextManager Page context manager.
026   */
027  protected BaseController(@Nonnull PageContextManager contextManager) {
028    this.context = contextManager;
029  }
030}
